Privacy Policy & Disclaimer

This privacy policy sets out how BroBBQ uses and protects any information that you give BroBBQ when you use this website. We are committed to ensuring that your privacy is protected.

Personal Information

The following information might be requested and collected through forms:

  • Name
  • Contact information (email address, phone number, age, etc.)
  • Miscellaneous information (interests, preferences, genders, etc.)

Any information collected is used by BroBBQ for the following purposes:

  • Respond to inquiries
  • Record keeping
  • Conduct surveys to improve user experience
  • Promotional emails about new posts, products, or special offers which we think might be in your interest

BroBBQ does not disclose any of your personal information to third parties.

Cookies, advertisement, and third party websites

Cookies are small data files which refer to a particular client or website user. They carry information from one website session to another and are created when a new page is loaded. For example, by enabling cookies, your login information will be stored on the server; otherwise a login action will be required every time you visit the website.  Website users can choose whether to enable, disable, delete, or clear cookies. By default, the cookie is destroyed when you close your browser.

BroBBQ uses cookies to give you better user experience by identifying and monitoring whether you find a certain page is useful or not. We only have access to the information you choose to share with us.

BroBBQ might allow third parties’ advertisements on our website. Non-personal information might be collected by such parties via cookies, scripts, or web beacons, which helps customize ad content that you may be interested in.

Like any other sites, BroBBQ requires a small amount of fee to keep the page up and running. From time to time, we may publish professional and unbiased reviews to receive compensation. BroBBQ is a participant of Amazon Associates Program, an affiliate program that allows website owners earn a small fee by linking to amazon.com, amazon.ca, amazon.co.uk, or amazon.de. Besides, BroBBQ may contain third party websites in our content. Please be aware that we do not have control over these sites and that their privacy policies might be different from ours.

BroBBQ reserves the right to adjust and update this Privacy Policy anytime without prior notice.
